manufacturers.name: Delly Factory
manufacturers.description: Delly Factory, powered by Annalife, specializes in creating nutritious and indulgent snacks. Focused on natural ingredients, Delly products are free from added sugars, high in fiber, and cater to health-conscious consumers. With a strong commitment to vegan, gluten-free, and protein-packed options, Delly provides delicious and functional snacks for energy, recovery, and mindful eating.

manufacturers.name: Vitalidade
manufacturers.description: Vitalidade is a pioneer in superfood-based nutrition, delivering a wide range of functional food products inspired by Harvard's list of Superfoods. Focused on health, well-being, and sustainability, Vitalidade combines Andean-origin superfoods with cutting-edge food technology to provide macro and micronutrient-rich meals, snacks, and beverages. Their offerings include cereals, shakes, juices, bars, and instant meals, catering to the growing demand for nutritious, convenient, and delicious food solutions.

manufacturers.name: Bind Chocolate
manufacturers.description: Bind Chocolate is a renowned manufacturer of high-quality, natural chocolates since 1971. The company is dedicated to providing handcrafted and industrial chocolate products, emphasizing real cocoa butter with no alternative fats. Bind Chocolate caters to B2B, gourmet, and retail sectors globally with a wide range of chocolate products.

The brand focuses on producing high-fiber, gluten-free, air-popped, and MSG-free snacks that cater to health-conscious consumers. Their product range includes both plain and flavored options, suitable for various dietary needs.
